subject: Compliments of the day my dear
body:
Compliments of the day my dear friend.
My Name is Mr. Mark Nzouba-Ndama, the son of Mr.Guy Nzouba-Ndama, from
Gabon in Central Africa and I'm the son of the former Gabon senate
president from his second wife. Recently the military took over the
government, arrested my father and many top government officials as
they also blocked all our accounts and put a watch tag on us.
I got your impressive information through Chambers of Commerce on
foreign business relations here in Togo.
Since the military take over there has been a lot of tension over here
that is why I have decided to relocate to your country and start a new
peaceful life. My father had secretly lodged the sum of (US$18.5m)
with a top security company in Togo and I am the only one that knew
about it and had access to it.
Because of the situation of things now in Gabon, I want to transfer
this money to you in your country so that you can keep it very safe
for me while I process my travel documents to meet with you over there
so that we can invest the money wisely with your guidance.
I am willing to compensate you very well for your assistance and also
believe you will benefit from any good profitable investment we put
the money into in your country. please confirm the receipt of this
message to my alternative email address ( 
mark_nzoubandama@writeme.com
) for more details
Kind regards
Mr. Mark Nzouba-Ndama

subject: Re: Compliments of the day my dear
body:
Hello Mr. Mark,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well despite the difficult situation in Gabon. I understand that you are facing challenges due to the military takeover and I sympathize with your circumstances.

I appreciate your trust in considering me to assist you with transferring the funds to my country. However, before we proceed, I would like to know more details about the situation and how this process would work. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. How did your father manage to secretly lodge such a large sum of money with a security company in Togo?
2. What kind of assistance do you require from me in order to transfer the funds safely?
3. Are there any legal implications or risks involved in this process that I should be aware of?
4. Can you explain more about the profitable investment opportunities we could explore once the funds are transferred?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: Compliments of the day my dear
body:
Dear Patricia 
 
Thanks for interest shown to my proposition which I believe will be of mutual financial benefit to both parties and to reach my goal. Your kind response confirmed my trust and Confidence in you to deliver this project. I want to assure you that I am very much interested to work with you on this as business partner only if you can assure me of your honest and sincere cooperation now and afterwards. 
 
I have decided to contact you for assistance to stand in as my father business partner of this funds, (all documents relevant to this will be provided to you for your security coverage) 
 
However, I would like to assure you at this junction that the success of this transaction is guaranteed provided that you cooperate with me and follow my directives hence, every arrangements to move these funds have been perfected but I need a trusted partner who talk less and worthy of trust, a legally binding agreement shall be drafted in association with this transaction and forwarded to you for your signature prior to the movement of funds in your names as would be agreed upon. 
 
Also you have to guarantee me the followings: 
 
1. That you will not cheat me when the fund hits your custody because I will provide all the information that will make the finance company authenticate your claim and have the fund released to you without any delay. 
 
2. That you will keep this transaction confidential so that both side securities will be guaranteed even after the transaction is concluded. 
 
3. That you will always consult me before taking any decision in relation to this transaction so that you don't make any mistake that will jeopardize the successful conclusion of this transaction. 
 
For your assistance in this transaction, you will be entitled to 40% of the total sum. I am not trying to be sel-fish or greedy since I know that you have a role to play in this transaction respectively. I know that 60% of (US$18.5m)Eighteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars is enough for me till I die. Greed kills. and this role simply entails retrieving the funds from the Security Company in Togo, 
 
Can your account accommodate this fund in your local bank without government intervention or do you have an account outside your country where you may consider safe for this funds? 
 
What are the taxation rates in your country like as I desire a low/free tax zone? 
 
What are the interest rates on long/short term fixed deposit in your local banks? 
 
What other lucrative investments would you suggest as I intend Real estate and Hotels if they are good business venture in your Country? 
 
Can you be able to make residential documents and purchase a house for me to relocate and settle in your country to futher my education after the transaction? 
 
 Kindly view the website below to confirm: 
 
 https://directinfosgabon.com/guy-nzouba-ndama-76-ans-interpelle-avec-12-milliard-de-francs-dans-ses-valises (https://deref-mail.com/mail/client/jz3UB19q2QY/dereferrer/?redirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fdirectinfosgabon.com%2Fguy-nzouba-ndama-76-ans-interpelle-avec-12-milliard-de-francs-dans-ses-valises) 
Upon your response including your direct cellphone number/nationality and contact details which i will use to get you an application form from the finance company,to complete the shipment 
 
Now I think everything is very clear. 
 
Full Name:--------------- 
Contact Address:--------- 
Telephone Number:-------- 
Email Address:----------- 
Occupation:-------------- 
Sex:--------------------- 
Age:--------------------- 
Marital Status:---------- 
Nationality:------------- 
Copy of Intel passport,drivers license,or any valid ID card:---------- 
The name of the closest airport to your country of residence:---------- 
 
Yours truly 
Regards, 
Mr. Mark Nzouba-Ndama, 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2024 at 9:02 PM From: "Patricia" <bu46232@***.com> To: mark_nzoubandama@writeme.com Subject: Re: Compliments of the day my dear 
 
Hello Mr. Mark, 
Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well despite the difficult situation in Gabon. I understand that you are facing challenges due to the military takeover and I sympathize with your circumstances. 
I appreciate your trust in considering me to assist you with transferring the funds to my country. However, before we proceed, I would like to know more details about the situation and how this process would work. Could you please provide me with some additional information? 
1. How did your father manage to secretly lodge such a large sum of money with a security company in Togo? 
2. What kind of assistance do you require from me in order to transfer the funds safely? 
3. Are there any legal implications or risks involved in this process that I should be aware of? 
4. Can you explain more about the profitable investment opportunities we could explore once the funds are transferred? 
I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes, 
Patricia

subject: Re: Compliments of the day my dear
body:
Dear Patricia,

Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to assist me. I understand your concerns and I'm happy to provide you with more details about the situation.

To answer your questions, my father was a successful businessman who had connections in various countries, including Togo. He decided to lodge the funds with a security company there due to its reputation for safekeeping valuable assets.

The assistance I require from you is to act as my father's business partner in order to facilitate the transfer of the funds. This involves providing your bank account details so that the funds can be transferred securely. Rest assured, all necessary legal documents will be provided to ensure the legitimacy of this transaction.

As with any financial transaction, there are always risks involved. However, I have taken precautions to minimize these risks by ensuring that all necessary documentation is in place and that we have a legally binding agreement. Additionally, I will be available to guide you through the process and address any concerns or questions you may have along the way.

Once the funds are successfully transferred, we can explore various profitable investment opportunities together. Real estate and hotels are indeed good business ventures, but I am open to other suggestions as well. We can discuss further once we have successfully completed this transaction.

I appreciate your cooperation and look forward to working with you on this endeavor. Please provide me with your direct cellphone number and contact details so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Patricia
